QuestData.Title: Insight into Our Enemies
QuestData.Description:
There's no telling what awaits us within this land. We cannot press forward without first knowing exactly what we're up against.
Although our new allies have suffered greatly at the hands of the naga, their hardships will not be in vain.
The kelfin should have invaluable knowledge of Azshara's forces.
With their help, we might be able to learn more about how our enemies operate.
Speak with Neri and see what insight she can provide.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Neri to learn more about the naga within Nazjatar.
